file.name: authentication-apikey.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2

info:
  title: Eclipse Kapua REST API - Authentication
  version: '1.0'
  contact:
    name: Eclipse Kapua Dev Team
    url: https://eclipse.org/kapua
    email: kapua-dev@eclipse.org
  license:
    name: Eclipse Public License 2.0
    url: https://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0

paths:
  /authentication/apikey:
    post:
      tags:
        - Authentication
      summary: Login - API Key
      operationId: authenticationApiKey
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                apiKey:
                  type: string
                  format: base64
                  example: 'z8PEVr4XdBS/KKEKbVG9tJzj6DNNpSVCDpW53CWm'
              required:
                - apiKey
      responses:
        200:
          description: The new AccessToken
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './authentication.yaml#/components/schemas/accessToken'
        500:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/kapuaError'
      security: []

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /authentication/apikey: post: operation "authenticationApiKey": responses: 500: resolve "../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/kapuaError" reference: external "../openapi.yaml": file: local file reference is not allowed
